entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
